segments.text: I can't believe my eyes looking at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing dramatically, water sheeting down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right there, foot in the puddle, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so serene, completely tuned out to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinets, the cookie jar's open and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stretched up on that precarious stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and it'll all come tumbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in one handâ€” smart, but still dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister reaches up, eyes full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're in their own little world of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a beautiful garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight pours in, making the inside hazards stand out more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how much can go unnoticed in a busy kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they all stay safe through this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a story this drawing tells.
segments.speaker: PAR
